description.zh-cn: 位于香港岛东区的住宅区，是香港最早开发的地区之一。
description.en: A residential area in the Eastern District of Hong Kong Island, one of the earliest developed areas in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 位于筲箕湾北部的填海区，名称源于爱秩序将军。
description.en: A reclaimed area in the northern part of Shau Kei Wan, named after Major-General Edward Aldrich.

description.zh-cn: 英国将军，爱秩序湾以此命名。
description.en: A British Major-General after whom Aldrich Bay is named.

description.zh-cn: 香港总督，曾下令整顿筲箕湾地区。
description.en: Governor of Hong Kong who ordered the redevelopment of the Shau Kei Wan area.

en: Shau Kei Wan Main Street East

description.zh-cn: 筲箕湾的一条主要街道，于1860年代由香港总督麦当奴下令修建。
description.en: A major street in Shau Kei Wan, constructed in the 1860s under the order of Governor Richard Graves MacDonnell.

description.zh-cn: 1860年代为打击海盗而设立的警察局。
description.en: A police station established in the 1860s to combat piracy.

description.zh-cn: 位于筲箕湾山边的寮屋村落，后被清拆。
description.en: A squatter village on the hillside of Shau Kei Wan, which was later demolished.

description.zh-cn: 1983年发生于筲箕湾圣十字径村的一场大火，促使政府全面清拆该区的寮屋。
description.en: A major fire in Holy Cross Path Village, Shau Kei Wan in 1983, which prompted the government to completely clear the squatter areas in the district.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港筲箕湾的公共屋邨。
description.en: A public housing estate in Shau Kei Wan, Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港筲箕湾的公共屋邨。
description.en: A public housing estate in Shau Kei Wan, Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港港铁营运的铁路线路之一。
description.en: One of the rapid transit lines operated by the MTR in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港岛北岸的公路，连接铜锣湾和柴湾。
description.en: An expressway on the northern shore of Hong Kong Island, connecting Causeway Bay and Chai Wan.

description.zh-cn: 香港主要的地产发展商之一。
description.en: One of the major property developers in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 位于筲箕湾的私人住宅屋苑。
description.en: A private residential estate in Shau Kei Wan.

description.zh-cn: 位于筲箕湾的单幢式私人住宅。
description.en: A single-building private residence in Shau Kei Wan.

description.zh-cn: 爱秩序湾的名称源于爱秩序将军。
description.en: The name of Aldrich Bay originates from Major-General Edward Aldrich.

description.zh-cn: 1860年，香港总督麦当奴决定整顿筲箕湾区，重新建屋辟路，是为筲箕湾东大街。
description.en: In 1860, Governor of Hong Kong Richard Graves MacDonnell decided to redevelop the Shau Kei Wan area, building new houses and roads, which became Shau Kei Wan Main Street East.

description.zh-cn: 为打击海盗问题，麦当奴于1860年下令在筲箕湾设立派出所。
description.en: To combat piracy, MacDonnell ordered the establishment of a police station in Shau Kei Wan in 1860.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战后，大批中国大陆的难民涌入筲箕湾，改变了当地的人口结构和社区面貌。
description.en: After World War II, a large number of refugees from mainland China poured into Shau Kei Wan, changing the local demographics and community landscape.

description.zh-cn: 1983年的大火使香港政府决心整顿筲箕湾山边的寮屋区，并开始全面清拆。
description.en: The fire in 1983 prompted the Hong Kong Government to resolve to clear the squatter areas on the hillsides of Shau Kei Wan and began a comprehensive demolition.

description.zh-cn: 1983年圣十字径村大火后，香港政府开始全面清拆该村及其他寮屋区。
description.en: After the Holy Cross Path Village fire in 1983, the Hong Kong Government began the complete demolition of the village and other squatter areas.

description.zh-cn: 香港政府在清拆圣十字径村等寮屋区后，在原址开山兴建了耀东邨等公共屋苑。
description.en: After demolishing squatter areas like Holy Cross Path Village, the Hong Kong Government developed the site by cutting into the hill to build public housing estates such as Yiu Tung Estate.

description.zh-cn: 香港政府在清拆圣十字径村等寮屋区后，在原址开山兴建了兴东邨等公共屋苑。
description.en: After demolishing squatter areas like Holy Cross Path Village, the Hong Kong Government developed the site by cutting into the hill to build public housing estates such as Hing Tung Estate.

description.zh-cn: 1904年，香港电车将服务延伸至筲箕湾，将其与当时的行政中心维多利亚城连接起来，促进了该区发展。
description.en: In 1904, Hong Kong Tramways extended its service to Shau Kei Wan, connecting it with the then administrative center, Victoria City, which promoted the area's development.

description.zh-cn: 1985年港岛线的建成大大改善了筲箕湾的交通状况。
description.en: The completion of the Island Line in 1985 significantly improved the traffic conditions in Shau Kei Wan.

description.zh-cn: 1989年东区走廊的建成大大改善了筲箕湾的交通状况。
description.en: The completion of the Island Eastern Corridor in 1989 significantly improved the traffic conditions in Shau Kei Wan.

description.zh-cn: 新鸿基地产为形荟的发展商，该屋苑于2018年入伙。
description.en: Sun Hung Kai Properties is the developer of Lime Gala, which was occupied in 2018.

description.zh-cn: 新鸿基地产为i·UniQ 誉都的发展商，该住宅于2013年入伙。
description.en: Sun Hung Kai Properties is the developer of i·UniQ Residence, which was occupied in 2013.
